section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
HollandBIO, the Netherlands’ biotech industry association, is one of the main anchors of the Dutch biotech sector and brings together over a hundred and seventy five Dutch companies and organizations that are active in biotechnology. Our members reflect the sector: large corporations, small and medium-sized enterprises and start-ups and they create novel (bio)technologies, applications and products for agricultural, industrial, environmental, food or health use.  
HollandBIO actively looks after the sector’s interests and support a strong, national and international network.  
HollandBIO’s activities include advocacy, networking, national and international representation, as well as a number of services dedicated to supporting start-ups and SMEs.
